summary: A test suite that validates the core rate‑control and bandwidth‑estimation mechanisms of the aiortc library, including additive increase/multiplicative decrease behavior, inter‑arrival processing, over‑use detection, rate counting, and remote bitrate adaptation under simulated network conditions.
business_intent: Ensure reliable and efficient real‑time communication by confirming that bitrate estimation and congestion‑control algorithms function correctly, preventing quality degradation and network overload in production deployments.
